name: codeguardian
description: Full-stack application with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.dev: concurrently "yarn workspace codeguardian-backend dev" "yarn workspace codeguardian-frontend start"
scripts.build: yarn workspace codeguardian-backend build && yarn workspace codeguardian-frontend build
scripts.start: concurrently "yarn workspace codeguardian-backend start" "yarn workspace codeguardian-frontend preview"
scripts.test: yarn workspace codeguardian-backend test && yarn workspace codeguardian-frontend test
scripts.lint: yarn workspace codeguardian-backend lint && yarn workspace codeguardian-frontend lint
scripts.lint:fix: yarn workspace codeguardian-backend lint:fix && yarn workspace codeguardian-frontend lint:fix
scripts.clean: yarn workspace codeguardian-backend clean && yarn workspace codeguardian-frontend clean
scripts.type-check: yarn workspace codeguardian-backend type-check && yarn workspace codeguardian-frontend type-check
